game_description: This is GorillaRooms. It's technically The Backrooms but you move with your hands:) The Backrooms is a fictional realm which if you can noclip out of reality, you will end up in The Backrooms. Explore this place with no monsters...or is there? This game has a gorilla tag based movement so run, jump, wallrun or just... chill and look in the mirror. That's all!
review_1: It feels like it's been a year since I've heard the voice of someone in this game. Please don't give up on your game and bring it back as soon as you can. This was one of my favorite games. Please bring multiplayer back. If you gave up, that's fine. I'm just glad you got to work on this game so much.
review_2: This game was the best with friends and now no one can play together. Don’t give up on it. Has been a year or something since I has heard a child screaming at the sight of the monsters and I want other to experience the fun. Please come back. Please
review_3: Hey, I'm Sir.Toasy. And I had this game for a while. I loved it. I truly did. I'd get home after school and play this game until my battery died with complete strangers. I truly loved it. I even said it was better than G Tag. And if you're still working on that photon update. Don't give up! Literal hundreds or even thousands enjoy this game. As a community, we love your project. So please. If it takes even longer. Hopefully, the end product will be legendary! Thanks for the fun times, laughs, and screams! And hopefully, those will return. Thank you! Really. - Sir.Toasty
review_4: Please bring multiplayer back and continue to work on this:( I’ve been waiting 11 months :[
review_5: Pls bring it back I have been waiting for 19 months
